item.title: [one] Tamiyo's Logbook
item.description:
Artifact

{5}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each other artifact you control.

item.title: [one] Bladed Ambassador
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Soldier

Bladed Ambassador enters the battlefield with an oil counter on it.

{1}, Remove an oil counter from Bladed Ambassador: Bladed Ambassador gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [one] Phyrexian Vindicator
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Flying

If damage would be dealt to Phyrexian Vindicator, prevent that damage. When damage is prevented this way, Phyrexian Vindicator deals that much damage to any other target.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngNAJSkyEss

item.title: [one] Cankerbloom
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Fungus

{1}, Sacrifice Cankerbloom: Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Proliferate.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ngNAJSkyEss

item.title: [one] Magmatic Sprinter
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Warrior

Haste

When Magmatic Sprinter enters the battlefield, put two oil counters on target artifact or creature you control.

At the beginning of your ned step, return Magmatic Sprinter to its owner's hand unless you remove two oil counters from it.

https://twitter.com/CoreyBaumeister/status/1616867745613717510

item.title: [one] Transplant Theorist
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Artificer

Whenever Transplant Theorist or another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

{2}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

item.title: [one] Vraan, Executioner Thane
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Vampire

Whenever one or more other creatures you control die, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://m.cafe.daum.net/magin/9Uu6/5419

item.title: [one] The Filigree Sylex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{T}: Put an oil counter on The Filigree Sylex.

{T}, Sacrifice The Filigree Sylex: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of oil counters on The Filigree Sylex.

{T}, Remove ten oil counters from among permanents you control and sacrifice The Filigree Sylex: It deals 10 damage to any target.

item.title: [one] Urabrask's Anointer
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

When Urabrask's Anointer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you control with oil counters on them.

https://bbs.nga.cn/read.php?tid=35097655

item.title: [one] Sawblade Scamp
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Haste

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an oil counter on Sawblade Scamp.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Sawblade Scamp: It deals 1 damage to each opponent.

https://screenrant.com/mtg-phyrexa-all-will-be-one-card-preview-oxidda-finisher/

item.title: [one] Malcator, Purity Overseer
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Elephant Wizard

When Malcator, Purity Overseer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.

At the beginning of your end step, if three or more artifacts entered the battlefield under your control this turn, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.

https://www.pcgamer.com/the-next-magic-sets-biomechanical-nightmare-was-inspired-by-classical-depictions-of-hell/

item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Wizard

When Urabrask's Anointer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of permanents you control with oil counters on them.

item.title: [one] Viral Spawning
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 3/3 green Phyrexian Beast creature token with toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters and Viral Spawning as in your graveyard, it has flashback {2}{G}. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

https://twitter.com/CoolStuffInc/status/1616465827238219779

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Beast

Haste

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an oil counter on Sawblade Scamp.

{T}, Remove an oil counter from Sawblade Scamp: It deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [one] Ichorplate Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Golem

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it has one or more oil counters on it, put an oil counter on it.

Creatures you control with oil counters on them get +1/+1.

https://twitter.com/eliott_dragon/status/1616484449813659679

item.title: [one] Mindsplice Apparatus
item.description:
Artifact

Flash

At the beginning of your upkeep, put an oil counter on Mindsplice Apparatus.

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each oil counter on Mindsplice Apparatus.

https://twitter.com/eliott_dragon/status/1616484449813659679

item.title: [one] Kethek, Crucible Goliath
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Beast

At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [one] Ezuri, Stalker of Spheres
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

When Ezuri, Stalker of Spheres enters the battlefield, you may pay {3}. If you do, proliferate twice.

Whenever you proliferate, draw a card.

item.title: [one] Dross Skullbomb
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, Sacrifice Dross Skullbomb: Draw a card.

{2}{B}, Sacrifice Dross Skullbomb: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

Artifact

item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it has toxic, draw a card.

item.title: [one] "Hands You An Egg"
item.description:
Artifact

"Hands You An Egg" enters the battlefield with three oil counters on it.

{4}, {T}, Remove an oil counter from "Hands You An Egg": Create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Advisor

Whenever you proliferate, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [one] Chittering Skitterling
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Rat

Corrupted — Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Draw a card. Activate only if an opponent has three or more poison counters and only once each turn.

https://dominarialibrary.com/reading/phyrexia-all-will-be-one-preview/

item.title: [onc] Court of Grace
item.description:
Enchantment

When Court of Grace enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you're the monarch, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying instead.

item.title: [onc] Collective Effort
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.

item.title: [onc] Call the Coppercoats
item.description:
Instant

Strive — This spell costs {1}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

Choose any number of target opponents. Create X 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures those opponents control.

item.title: [onc] Battle Screech
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying.

Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [onc] Emeria Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

item.title: [onc] Elspeth Tirel
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

−2: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

−5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

item.title: [onc] Cut a Deal
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent draws a card, then you draw a card for each opponent who drew a card this way.

item.title: [onc] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [onc] Fumigate
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.

item.title: [onc] Flawless Maneuver
item.description:
Instant

If you control a commander, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Finale of Glory
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

item.title: [onc] Felidar Retreat
item.description:
Enchantment

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —

• Create a 2/2 white Cat Beast creature token.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Grateful Apparition
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [onc] Goldnight Commander
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric Soldier

Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [onc] Ghostly Prison
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

item.title: [onc] Harmonious Archon
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

Non-Archon creatures have base power and toughness 3/3.

When Harmonious Archon enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

item.title: [onc] Increasing Devotion
item.description:
Sorcery

Create five 1/1 white Human creature tokens. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, create ten of those tokens instead.

Flashback {7}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [onc] Hour of Reckoning
item.description:
Sorcery

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

Destroy all nontoken creatures.

item.title: [onc] Mentor of the Meek
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [onc] Maul of the Skyclaves
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Maul of the Skyclaves enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and first strike.

Equip {2}{W}{W}

item.title: [onc] Martial Coup
item.description:
Sorcery

Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.

item.title: [onc] Mace of the Valiant
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Mace of the Valiant and has vigilance.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a charge counter on Mace of the Valiant.

Equip {3}

item.title: [onc] Intangible Virtue
item.description:
Enchantment

Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
